game.name: Demon With A Candy Crisis
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A quick and easy 3d platformer playing as a demon that needs to quench its thirst for candy. Travel through hell to get to the surface to find someone's secret stash of candy.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A quick and easy 3d platformer playing as a demon that needs to quench its thirst for candy. Travel through hell to get to the surface to find someone's secret stash of candy.
